'''Beta 1.16.200.51''' is the first beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.200]], released on October 22, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url= https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360050933412|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.200.51 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=October 22, 2020}}</ref> which makes changes to death messages and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Death messages]]'''
* Added the following new death messages:
** "<player> was sniped by <player/mob>" (Killed by a [[shulker]] bullet)
** "<player> was spitballed by <player/mob>" (Killed by [[llama]] spit)

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Death messages]]'''
* Changed the following new death messages to match {{el|je}}:
** "<player> was shot by skeleton" (Replaces "...shot by arrow" for [[skeleton]]s)
** "<player> was impaled to death by <player/mob>" (Replaces "...slain by Trident")
** "<player> was fireballed by <player/mob>" (Replaces "...slain by Blaze/Ghast")

=== General ===
'''[[RenderDragon]]'''
* Re-enabled in this beta.

== Fixes ==
'''Accessibility Features'''
* Fixed a bug where UI screen reader did not read the screen title in-game
* Fixed a bug where the UI screen reader did not read the shortcut button on the Pause Screen
* Fixed a bug where the UI screen reader did not read the title on the Profile and Edit Character screens
* Fixed an issue where the numbering of buttons in the Pause screen was wrong when using text-to-speech
* Fixed several issues regarding text contrast

'''Gameplay'''
* Death message bugfixes ({{bug|MCPE-30360}}, {{bug|MC-116558}})
** Death message for being shot by Shulker is now "sniped by shulker" instead of "slain by shulkerBullet"
** Death message for being fireballed by Blaze or Ghast is now "fireballed by <Blaze | Ghast>" instead of "slain by <Blaze | Ghast>"
** Death message for being shot by Skeleton is now "shot by skeleton" instead of "shot by arrow"
** Death message for being spit at by Llama is now "spitballed by Llama" instead of "slain by Llama spit"
** Death message for being killed with a trident is now "was impaled to death by " instead of "slain by Trident"
* Nether Brick Blocks are once again craftable ({{bug|MCPE-101736}})
* Fixed the number of Nether Bricks in the Crafting Table ({{bug|MCPE-101818}})

'''Mobs'''
* Increased allowed spawn distance for raid mobs as well as improved the ability to find a valid raid spawn position

'''Components'''
* Armor with the lock in inventory component can now be placed in the armor slots ({{bug|MCPE-102244}})

'''Items'''
* Fixed an issue of anyone using {{cd|query.get_equipped_item_name}} with an item that was renamed wouldn't get the right result.</onlyinclude>
